message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV. 

The paper proposes a computational approach to autonomous goal system development, which involves learning goals as high-level abstractions of lower-level intention mechanisms such as rewards and values. This falls under the scope of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses practical reinforcement learning problems and developmental scenarios, which could be categorized under robotics (cs.RO) and systems and control (cs.SY). Finally, the paper investigates the use of visual saliency in inducing task-unspecific rewards, which could be related to computer vision (cs.CV).
